creator: jashepherd@hotmail.com
text: The manager app page is displaying in french by default after a new clean install of the windows installer for Tomcat 7.0.19.  I've tested twice on 2 different machines, both of which are set to en-US as far as the OS and browser locale settings.  Duplicate by installing, then starting the server, and then go to the default index.html root landing page ('If you're seeing this, you've successfully installed Tomcat. Congratulations!'), and then click on the 'manager app' button/link.  The manager app displays in French.
Seems to only occur in Firefox (I'm using 5.0)
creator: jashepherd@hotmail.com
markt@apache.org
text: This works for me and nothing has changed in this area since late last year. You almost certainly have a configuration problem and the users list is the place to seek help.
Issue was browser related, not Tomcat.  Please ignore.
creator: jashepherd@hotmail.com
